info.summary:
ATR Trailing Stop attempts to determine the primary trend of prices by using Average True Range (ATR) band thresholds. It can indicate a buy/sell signal or a trailing stop when the trend changes.
See documentation for more information.
info.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
info.param: Multiplier sets the ATR band width.
Sets basis for stop offsets (Close or High/Low).
info.returns: Time series of ATR Trailing Stop values.
